svg.text: YOLOv13 + DINOv3 Vision Transformer - Complete Technical Architecture
Comprehensive Layer-by-Layer Implementation with Multi-Scale Enhancement Options
YOLOv13 Multi-Scale Detection Head with Enhanced Features

g.text: P4 Branch - Medium Objects (40×40×512) ⭐ DINO3 Enhanced
Enhanced medium object detection with transformer features
Total Parameters: 99.4M (86M frozen DINO3 + 13.4M trainable YOLOv13)
Expected mAP Improvement: +5-10% over standard YOLOv13

svg.text: Multi-Scale Object Detection with DINO3 Enhancement
Bounding Boxes + Object Classes + Confidence Scores
